alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 1:43PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Harrison, southeastern Crawford, northeastern Perry and northwestern Meade Counties through 215 PM EDT/115 PM CDT/... At 142 PM EDT/1242 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Carefree Town, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Carefree Town around 150 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
